PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09672020-11-29,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC,  PHAC,  , 
ActQuarantine Act
SubjectMinimizing the Risk of Exposure to COVID-19 in Canada Order (Mandatory Isolation), No. 8
PrecisMINIMIZING THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19 IN CANADA ORDER (MANDATORY ISOLATION), NO. 8 in order to (1) support Canadaâ€™s continued focus on reducing the introduction and further spread of COVID-19 by decreasing the risk of importing cases from outside the country; (2) maintain the previous requirements that all persons who have reasonable grounds to suspect they have COVID-19, have signs and symptoms of COVID-19, or know they have COVID-19 upon entry into Canada are required to quarantine or isolate for 14 days, including asymptomatic persons, with limited exceptions; (3) exempt athletes and support personnel participating in or engaging in certain high-performance international single sport events from the requirement to quarantine under specified conditions; (4) remove clauses that are expired, and update clause references accordingly; and (5) make minor edits for improved readability.
AttachmentsAttachment
